author: sebawagner
msg: OPENMEETINGS-434 fix fetch strategy for Users on single query:

Fixes if you save a new key and then directly hit save again to update it, only the Date (updated) was shown in the UI, not the user.login. That was due to the missing user object in the update statement.

author: hboutemy
msg: added a link to Maven core's way of creating repository system session

author: stefan2
msg: Extend 1.7 release notes to point out a performance pitfall.
There were users reporting severe performance regressions with
large directories. This is by design but users should be warned
about it and how they may avoid the problem.
(compatibility): add note about large dir caching
